mapper.update: update tb_comments set praise_number = praise_number + 1 where id = #{commentId} and is_delete = 0 and is_show = 0 and is_complain = 0;
update tb_comments set praise_number = praise_number - 1 where id = #{commentId} and is_delete = 0 and praise_number > 0 and is_show = 0 and is_complain = 0;
update tb_comments set is_delete = 1 where (id = #{commentId} or parent_id = #{commentId} or top_id = #{commentId}) and is_delete = 0 and is_show = 0 and is_complain = 0
update tb_comments set is_delete = 1 where article_id = #{articleId};
update tb_comments set is_show = #{isShow} where article_id = #{articleId};
mapper.select: select c.id,user_id,username,avatar,content,c.create_time,is_sticky,praise_number,article_id from tb_user as u,tb_comments as c where c.user_id = u.id and c.is_delete = 0 and u.is_delete = 0 and c.is_show = 0 and c.is_complain = 0 and c.article_id = #{articleId} and is_top = 0 order by c.create_time desc,praise_number desc

select c.id,user_id,username,avatar,content,c.create_time,parent_id,top_id,is_sticky,praise_number,article_id from tb_user as u,tb_comments as c where c.user_id = u.id and c.is_delete = 0 and u.is_delete = 0 and c.is_show = 0 and c.is_complain = 0 and c.parent_id = #{parentId} and c.top_id = #{topId} order by c.create_time desc,praise_number desc

SELECT create_time FROM tb_comments AS a WHERE ((user_id = #{userId} or parent_id in (SELECT id FROM tb_comments WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_delete = 0)) AND is_delete = 0) ORDER BY create_time asc LIMIT 1;
